title: 'The End Of The F***ing World' Season 2 Trailer Is Here
text:
The big guns at Netflix have unleashed the trailer for The End Of The F***ing World season 2. And yes, t’is a delightfully unsettling trailer.

The End Of The F***ing World, based on the award-winning graphic novel by Charles Forsman, tells the tale of teens James (Alex Lawther) and Alyssa (Jessica Barden) as they set out in search of Alyssa’s dad, who left home when she was just a wee bub.

Also, James is kind of a psychopath who’s bored of killing cats and birds. And, Alyssa is supposed to be his first human vicim, except they catch feelings for each other instead. It’s very normal content.

Season 2’s trailer picks up right where season 1 dropped off… with us wondering whether or not James is indeed dead. We don’t actually find out though. Instead, we cop a lot of Alyssa on her own… plus a wedding that is not at all troubling. We also get a lovely first look at new character Bonnie, played by Naomi Ackie (Lady Macbeth). Bonnie is described as an outsider with a troubled past and a mysterious connection to Alyssa.

The End Of The F***ing World season 2 hits Netflix, November 5.

Once again, no James. Well, except for that, uh, bloody bit. I refuse to believe he’s dead.

Season 1 came out October 24, 2017, so I wouldn’t blame you for re-binging the first season. Netflix will probably drop a lil’ recap video before the premiere too. One will definitely auto-play once you load up season 2.
description: The big guns at Netflix have unleashed the trailer for The End Of The F***ing World season 2. And yes, t'is a delightfully unsettling trailer.
